WorkItem.Description:
I am trying to load my character from Battle.net - EU, Ravencrest
 
I get the following error, with any character I try.
 
The remote server returned an error: (404) Not Found.
   at System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse(IAsyncResult asyncResult)
   at System.Net.WebClient.GetWebResponse(WebRequest request, IAsyncResult result)
   at System.Net.WebClient.DownloadBitsResponseCallback(IAsyncResult result)
 
I know what a 404 means, but that makes no sense - except if the URL request in the code has an incorrect URL?
 
/C

Comments.Message:
